data.title: 3119 Honeysuckle Way, Katy, TX 77493
data.meta_description: For Sale: 3119 Honeysuckle Way, Katy, TX 77493 ∙ $715,000 ∙ 0.19 Acres Lot ∙ 3,398 Sqft, 4 beds, 3 full and 1 half baths, Single-Family ∙ View more.
data.text:
4 Bedroom(s)

3 Full & 1 Half Bath(s)

3,398 Sqft. ($210/Sqft.) 316 (m²)

8,446 Lot Sqft 785 Lot (m²)

Single-Family

Audio narrative

3119 Honeysuckle Way is listed for sale at $ 715,000. The Single-Family property has 4 bedrooms, 3 Full Bathrooms, 1 Half Bathroom, 3398 square feet and was built in 2023. The lot size is 8446 Square feet. ##BR##WOW! Incredible curb appeal. When you step inside you are stunned with a foyer featuring 21-ft ceilings and a Grand Circular Staircase with an Elegant Rotunda. A study w/French doors on your left and a huge dining area to your right. Natural light floods the open living area with a wall of windows, creating a bright and welcoming space. Kitchen boasts Quartz countertops, a generous island with built-in seating, Ample cabinet space, and a 5-burner gas cooktop. This stunning home includes 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths, situated on a cul-de-sac street. Enjoy outdoor living with a spacious covered extended patio perfect for entertaining, plenty of backyard space, and no back neighbors. Additional features include a mudroom just off the three-car tandem garage. Good Size Primary bedroom with primary bath that offers dual vanities, a corner garden tub, a separate glass-enclosed shower, and 2 walk-in closets. The home also includes a media room, game room, providing ample space for work and play.

This stunning home includes 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths, situated on a cul-de-sac street. Enjoy outdoor living with a spacious covered extended patio perfect for entertaining, plenty of backyard space, and no back neighbors. Additional features include a mudroom just off the three-car tandem garage. Good Size Primary bedroom with primary bath that offers dual vanities, a corner garden tub, a separate glass-enclosed shower, and 2 walk-in closets. The home also includes a media room, game room, providing ample space for work and play.
